sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { RouterModule } from '@angular/router'; import { AuthService } from '../../services/auth.service'; import { DataService } from '../../services/data.service'; import { User, Group, Channel } from '../../models'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, RouterModule], template: `

Dashboard

Welcome back, {{ currentUser?.username }}!

My Groups

{{ userGroups.length }}

Total Users

{{ allUsers.length }}

Total Groups

{{ allGroups.length }}

Total Channels

{{ allChannels.length }}

My Groups

No groups yet

Join a group or create one to get started!

{{ group.name }}
{{ group.memberUserIds.length }} members
#{{ getChannelName(channelId) }}
View
Quick Actions
All Channels

No channels yet

{{ channel.name }} {{ getGroupName(channel.groupId) }}
Create New Group
{{ errorMessage }}
`, styles: [] }) export class DashboardComponent implements OnInit { currentUser: User | null = null; userGroups: Group[] = []; allUsers: User[] = []; allGroups: Group[] = []; allChannels: Channel[] = []; showCreateGroupModal: boolean = false; showJoinGroupModal: boolean = false; newGroupName: string = ''; errorMessage: string = ''; constructor( private authService: AuthService, private dataService: DataService ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.loadData(); } private loadData(): void { this.currentUser = this.authService.getCurrentUser(); if (this.currentUser) { this.userGroups = this.dataService.getGroupsForUser(this.currentUser.id); } this.allUsers = this.dataService.getAllUsers(); this.allGroups = this.dataService.getAllGroups(); this.allChannels = this.dataService.getAllChannels(); } get canCreateGroup(): boolean { return this.authService.isSuperAdmin() || this.authService.isGroupAdmin(); } getChannelName(channelId: string): string { const channel = this.dataService.getChannelById(channelId); return channel ? channel.name : 'Unknown'; } getGroupName(groupId: string): string { const group = this.dataService.getGroupById(groupId); return group ? group.name : 'Unknown'; } createGroup(): void { if (!this.newGroupName.trim() || !this.currentUser) return; this.errorMessage = ''; const result = this.dataService.createGroup(this.newGroupName, this.currentUser.id); if (result.success) { this.showCreateGroupModal = false; this.newGroupName = ''; this.loadData(); // Refresh data } else { this.errorMessage = result.error || 'Failed to create group'; } } }
